quotes.quote: May no portent of evil be attached to the words I say.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: To harken to evil conversation is the road to wickedness.. (Pravis Assuescere Sermonibus Est Via Ad Rem Ipsam)
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: No one gossips about other people's secret virtues.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: We cannot control the evil tongues of others; but a good life enables us to disregard them.
quotes.author: Cato the Elder

quotes.quote:
There is so much good in the worst of us,
And so much bad in the best of us,
That it hardly behooves any of us
To talk about the rest of us.
quotes.author: Edward Wallis Hoch

quotes.quote: Never tell evil of a man, if you do not know it for certainty, and if you know it for a certainty, then ask yourself, 'Why should I tell it?'
quotes.author: Johann K. Lavater

quotes.quote: A rumor without a leg to stand on will get around some other way.
quotes.author: John Tudor

quotes.quote: Many species reciprocate, but only humans gossip, and much of what we gossip about is the vale of other people as partners for reciprocal relationships.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Once you have listened to the gossip for some time, you will soon feel as if you know everyone, even if you have never met them.
quotes.author: Phocion

quotes.quote: Scandal is gossip made tedious by morality.
quotes.author: Sir Philip Sidney

quotes.quote: Have I inadvertently said some evil thing?
quotes.author: Spanish Proverb

quotes.quote: No sword bites so fiercly as an evil tongue.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: Whoever gossips to you will gossip about you.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: Live in such a way that you would not be ashamed to sell your parrot to the town gossip.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: Rumor travels faster, but it don't stay put as long as truth.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: The only time people dislike gossip is when you gossip about them.
Ill deeds are doubled with an evil word.
